title: E-mail confirming that the ticket has been sent? Account Recovery
body:
Hi,

I just sent a recovery account ticket but I have no idea if it went through or not, as I haven't received any e-mail informing me that the ticket was received by Riot Support. Is this normal? Are you not supposed to get an e-mail confirming that the ticket has been sent?

Thanks.

replies.body: Hey there, did you send this as a regular ticket requiring you to login or [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)?  If you did it via login then it would send to the registered email.  Otherwise, you should fill out that form and input an address you have access to, and our account team will reply back directly to the email for assistance.

Hello and thank you for responding so quickly!

I sent it as an account recovery form, so then everything should be fine. I am now going to wait for the account team to reply.

Thank you again for helping me.
